body:
utACK

On Tuesday, 21 June 2016, Wladimir J. van der Laan <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Updates to and from Transifex. Pulls in the following new languages:
>
>    - af Afrikaans
>    - es_419 Spanish (Latin America)
>    - es_AR Spanish (Argentina)
>    - es_CO Spanish (Colombia)
>    - fil Filipino
>    - it_IT Italian (Italy)
>    - ro Romanian
>    - sr@latin Serbian (Latin)
>    - ta Tamil
>    - uz@Latn Uzbek (Latin)
>    - zh_HK Chinese (Hong Kong)
>
> Doing this as an pull request instead of an auto-commit because I'm not
> sure about some of the new languages. To be specific I had to delete a fake
> "en_US" locale, which turned out to be Spanish.
> ------------------------------
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
>
>   https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8234
> Commit Summary
>
>    - Periodic transifex update
>
